mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT CC.*, MP.PET_IMG FROM COMMUNITY_COMMENT CC JOIN MEMBER_PET MP ON CC.MEM_CODE = MP.MEM_CODE WHERE CC.COMMENT_LEVEL = 0 AND CC.BOARD_NO = #{board_no} AND MP.PET_MAIN = 'Y' ORDER BY CC.COMMENT_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_COMMENT (COMMENT_NO, BOARD_NO, USER_ID, COMMENT_CONTENT, CREATED_DATE, PARENT_COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_LEVEL, COMMENT_ORDER_NO, EDITED_DATE, MEM_CODE) VALUES (COMMUNITY_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{board_no}, #{mem_nick}, #{comment_content}, SYSDATE, #{parent_comment_no}, #{comment_level} + 1, #{comment_order_no} + 1, SYSDATE, #{mem_code})
mapper.select: SELECT CC.*, MP.PET_IMG FROM COMMUNITY_COMMENT CC JOIN MEMBER_PET MP ON CC.MEM_CODE = MP.MEM_CODE WHERE CC.COMMENT_LEVEL >= 1 AND CC.BOARD_NO = #{board_no} AND MP.PET_MAIN = 'Y' ORDER BY CC.COMMENT_LEVEL
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY_COMMENT SET comment_level=comment_level + 1 WHERE PARENT_COMMENT_NO=#{param1} AND COMMENT_LEVEL > #{param2}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMMUNITY_COMMENT WHERE (SELECT COUNT(COMMENT_NO) FROM COMMUNITY_COMMENT WHERE PARENT_COMMENT_NO=#{parent_comment_no} AND COMMENT_LEVEL = #{comment_level}+1 AND COMMENT_ORDER_NO > #{comment_order_no})=0 AND COMMENT_NO=#{comment_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_LIKES (LIKE_ID, BOARD_NO, USER_ID, CREATED_DATE, MEM_CODE) VALUES (COMMUNITY_LIKES_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{board_no}, #{mem_nick}, SYSDATE, #{mem_code})

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_FEED (FEED_NO, MEM_CODE, BOARD_NO, USER_ID) VALUES (COMMUNITY_FEED_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mem_code}, #{board_no}, #{mem_nick})
mapper.select: SELECT CD.*, RCI.*, COALESCE(MP.PET_IMG, 'noPetImg.jpg') AS PET_IMG, CF.*, CF.USER_ID FROM COMMUNITY_BOARD CD LEFT JOIN RE_CBOARD_IMAGE RCI ON CD.BOARD_NO = RCI.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER_PET MP ON CD.MEM_CODE = MP.MEM_CODE AND MP.PET_MAIN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN COMMUNITY_FEED CF ON CD.BOARD_NO = CF.BOARD_NO WHERE CD.MEM_CODE = #{mem_code} ORDER BY CD.BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_REPORT (REPORT_ID, BOARD_NO, REPORTER_ID, REASON, REPORT_DATE, STATUS, COMMENT_NO, REPORT_TYPE) VALUES (COMMUNITY_REPORT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{board_no}, #{reporter_id}, #{reason}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, #{comment_no}, #{report_type})

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_FRIEND (FRIEND_NO, MEM_NICK, FRIEND_MEM_NICK, FRIEND_CREATED) VALUES(COMMUNITY_FRIEND_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mem_nick}, #{friend_mem_nick}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT CF.FRIEND_MEM_NICK, COALESCE(MP_FRIEND.PET_IMG, 'noPetImg.jpg') AS PET_IMG, M.MEM_NICK AS USER_MEM_NICK, MF.MEM_NICK AS FRIEND_MEM_NICK, MF.MEM_CODE AS FRIEND_MEM_CODE FROM COMMUNITY_FRIEND CF JOIN MEMBER M ON CF.MEM_NICK = M.MEM_NICK LEFT JOIN MEMBER_PET MP ON M.MEM_CODE = MP.MEM_CODE JOIN MEMBER MF ON CF.FRIEND_MEM_NICK = MF.MEM_NICK LEFT JOIN MEMBER_PET MP_FRIEND ON MF.MEM_CODE = MP_FRIEND.MEM_CODE WHERE CF.MEM_NICK = #{mem_nick}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B.*, NVL(P.PET_IMG, 'NOPETIMG.JPG') AS PET_IMG, F.FRIEND_MEM_NICK, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY B.USER_ID ORDER BY B.BOARD_CREATED DESC) AS rn FROM COMMUNITY_BOARD B LEFT JOIN MEMBER_PET P ON B.MEM_CODE = P.MEM_CODE AND P.PET_MAIN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN COMMUNITY_FRIEND F ON B.USER_ID = F.MEM_NICK WHERE B.BOARD_CREATED >= SYSDATE - INTERVAL '1' DAY AND F.FRIEND_MEM_NICK = #{mem_nick} ) story WHERE story.rn = 1 ORDER BY story.BOARD_CREATED DESC

SELECT CD.*, RCI.*, COALESCE(MP.PET_IMG, 'noPetImg.jpg') AS PET_IMG FROM COMMUNITY_BOARD CD LEFT JOIN RE_CBOARD_IMAGE RCI ON CD.BOARD_NO = RCI.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER_PET MP ON CD.MEM_CODE = MP.MEM_CODE AND MP.PET_MAIN = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR BOARD_CONTENT_INPUT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' ORDER BY BOARD_CREATED DESC
